description: Returns information about a device instance that belongs to a private device fleet.

parameters.name: arn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance you're requesting information about.

nested_items.name: deviceInstance
nested_items.description: An object that contains information about your device instance.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the device instance.

nested_items.name: labels
nested_items.description: An array of strings that describe the device instance.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the device instance. Valid values are listed here.

nested_items.name: udid
nested_items.description: Unique device identifier for the device instance.

nested_items.name: instanceProfile
nested_items.description: A object that contains information about the instance profile.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance profile.

nested_items.name: packageCleanup
nested_items.description: When set to true, Device Farm removes app packages after a test run. The default value is false for private devices.

nested_items.name: excludeAppPackagesFromCleanup
nested_items.description: An array of strings containing the list of app packages that should not be cleaned up from the device after a test run completes.

nested_items.name: rebootAfterUse
nested_items.description: When set to true, Device Farm reboots the instance after a test run. The default value is true.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the instance profile.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the instance profile.
